alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Clinch; Echols; Northern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 5:54PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Hamilton, Echols, southeastern Atkinson, northwestern Ware and Clinch Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 554 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Moody Air Force Base to 9 miles northwest of Madison. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Homerville, Jennings, Argyle, Statenville, Du Pont, Mayday, Needmore, Manor, Cogdell and Dixie Union. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for northern Florida...and southeastern Georgia.
